settings.title: Settings
settings.logoutConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to logout? All servers and settings will be cleared.

biometric.unavailableMessage: Biometric authentication is not available on this device.
biometric.notEnrolledMessage: No biometric credentials are enrolled on this device.

home.noServerMessage: Please add a server in Settings to get started.

addServer.title: Add Server
addServer.name: Name
addServer.openaiCompatibleDescription: Connect to any OpenAI-compatible API by specifying a custom base URL.
addServer.appleDescription: Uses Apple Foundation Models to run AI entirely on-device via CoreML. Requires iOS 26+ with Apple Intelligence support.

editServer.title: Edit Server
editServer.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this server? This action cannot be undone.

passwordLock.subtitleSetup: Set a password to protect your server data on this device.
passwordLock.subtitleReturning: Enter your password to unlock your servers.

errors.tooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters
errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.

biometricLock.failedMessage:
There was an issue with your authentication attempt.
Please try again.
biometricLock.authFailed: Authentication failed. Tap to try again.

sessions.title: Sessions
sessions.resetConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to reset this session? This will clear all message history.
sessions.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this session? This action cannot be undone.
sessions.noServerMessage: Please add a server in Settings to get started.
sessions.noSessionsMessage: Send a message to start your first session

skills.title: Skills
skills.subtitle: Teach and manage skills for your agent.
skills.skillsListDescription: All skills taught to the agent.
skills.removeConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove the skill "{{name}}"?
skills.openClawOnlyDescription: Skills are only available for OpenClaw servers.

clawHub.title: ClawHub
clawHub.description: Search community skills from ClawHub and install them to your agent.
clawHub.noResults: No skills found. Try a different search term.
clawHub.author: Author
clawHub.installError: Failed to install skill from ClawHub.
clawHub.searchError: Failed to search ClawHub. Please try again.

backupServers.title: Backup Servers
backupServers.description: Export your server configurations as a JSON file. Tokens are not included for security.

restoreServers.title: Restore Servers
restoreServers.description: Import server configurations from a JSON backup file. You will need to re-enter tokens after import.

setup.importSuccess: Servers restored from backup. You may need to re-enter API keys.

workflow.title: Workflow Mode
workflow.enableDescription: Load local documents as context for your chat session.
workflow.infoDescription: When enabled, selected documents are read and sent as context with each message. The AI can reference and suggest edits to your files.
workflow.privacyNote: Documents are read locally and only sent to your configured AI provider when you send a message.
workflow.noDocumentsDescription: Add documents to give your AI session context about your project files.
workflow.clearAllConfirm: Remove all documents from workflow context?

gatewayLogs.title: Gateway Logs
gatewayLogs.subtitle: View recent logs from the gateway server.
gatewayLogs.openClawOnlyDescription: Gateway logs are only available for OpenClaw servers.
gatewayLogs.logsDescription: Recent log entries from the gateway.
